name: Create your Dino
description:
Create your Dino allows you to create your ideal dinosaur, mixing together parts from different dinosaurs.
For example, you can choose a Tyrannosaur as a basis and put on the head of a Triceratops and so on.
After creating your dino, you can give it so many different positions and... take a picture with it!
Have fun

-Best on IPad
-Best for children aged 4 and up
